nodes.text: Copper was a metal, with the chemical symbol Cu, that had a reddish-brown tint comparable to the hair color of Mon Mothma. It had a smell and a taste resembling those of human blood. The presence of copper in compounds like grains of sand gave them a blue coloration. During the Galactic Civil War, copper was used as a component in certain starship fuels. Other uses of copper included droid plating.
